message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me, Alice. How about a more balanced approach? 45/55 split?
I understand you want a more balanced deal, Bob, but time is money.  I'll come down a little, 65/35.
Time is money for both of us, Alice. I need to see a bit more flexibility from your side.  48/52?
